Html:
I'm trying to integrate ctt into a VS2008 solution, but it turns out ctt returns exit code 4 on success. MSBuild assumes nonzero to be an error, so now I need to ignore exit codes in order to get this to work. Please change success return to exit code 0, which is I believe is a general convention.

Regards,
Bart

Hi Bart.

Sorry, it was my misprint ( http://ctt.codeplex.com/SourceControl/diff/file/view/880?fileId=5293 ) . Changed. Please download last version at http://ctt.codeplex.com/releases/view/52627

Thanks for feedback.
Is this bug active again. I'm getting a return code of 4 in v1.4.1.0.
Could you verify that you don't have any errors in output?

I found that I indeed had an error, and that's what the issue. :-)

Thanks for the reply!
Great, please let me know if you will have any other issues. I glad to hear that people like to use this tool.
